title: GAMEPLAY karthus sound bug
body: While playing Karthus with the Grim Reaper Plague (Frost) skin, Karthus would not talk throughout the game. All other sounds were heard but none of Karthus' dialogue could be heard.

replies.body:
Hey Avatar Kurroto - 

We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it ASAP! Thanks for the report!
